howToUse.title: How to Use Modify with Instructions

steps.title: Upload Your Video
steps.content: Start by uploading any video file (MP4, MOV, AVI) with a limit of 15 seconds and 50MB for processing through Modify with Instructions. Longer videos will be automatically trimmed to optimize your experience.

steps.title: Write Your Modification Instructions
steps.content: Provide detailed text instructions telling the AI exactly what changes to make, such as 'change the background to a cyberpunk city' or 'add magical effects around the character.' Then choose your base style from anime, cartoon, manga, or manhwa options.

steps.title: Style Preview & Reference
steps.content: We extract the first frame and apply your chosen style and instructions to create a styled reference. This preview shows how your customizations will be applied to the entire video.

steps.title: Generate Modified Video
steps.content: Let Modify with Instructions do the work as it transforms your entire video according to your specifications while preserving the original motion, facial expressions, and timing for a captivating final product.
